role: Site Reliability Engineer → Technical Lead, Data Platform
description: Progressed from SRE to Technical Lead, driving infrastructure automation, application migrations, and reliability improvements for the Data Platform.
achievements: Improved system reliability, increasing overall uptime by 15%.
Developed real-time clickstream analytics pipeline using AWS Kinesis, Lambda, and Athena.
Automated AWS infrastructure using Terraform and Ansible, improving operational efficiency.
Migrated applications to AWS ECS from standalone EC2 instances, reducing operational costs by 20%.
Designed zero-downtime AMI image deployment process across AWS ECS Clusters.
Contributed to development and maintenance of automation tools for AWS cloud infrastructure management.
Created and maintained documentation of systems and processes for existing and new systems.
Configured and maintained AWS Cloud Computing environments using Terraform.
